title: A.B.C. / BagPet
detail: A tiny device that helps you carry your luggage and follows your steps!
extended_details:
Autonomous Baggage Carrier
The goal of this project is to build an autonomous baggage carrier that could be quickly installed at the bottom of any baggage and carry it around following the owner. It is mainly expected to be applied at airports, train stations and hotels, especially for the convenience of the disabled.
